headline: PERRO VERDE, the Leading Sipping Mezcal on the Market, Announces Strategic Advisory Committee to Support Explosive Growth
summary: Today, PERRO VERDE — the leading sipping mezcal on the market — proudly announces the appointment of an exceptional group of industry titans to help propel the brand into its next phase of growth.

headline: Constellation Brands (STZ): Exploring Current Valuation Following Recent Share Price Declines
summary: Constellation Brands (STZ) stock has lagged over the past month, dropping 7% and sliding about 21% in the past 3 months. Investors are starting to look closely at recent performance to gauge value at current levels. See our latest analysis for Constellation Brands. Constellation Brands’ share price momentum has faded this year, with a 1-year total shareholder return of -44% and the stock closing recently at $130.53. While there is no headline-grabbing news event, recent declines suggest...

headline: TD Cowen Maintains Hold Rating on Constellation Brands (STZ) Stock
summary: Constellation Brands, Inc. (NYSE:STZ) is one of the Worst Performing Stocks to Invest in on the Dip. On November 13, analyst Robert Moskow from TD Cowen maintained a “Hold” rating on the company’s stock and reduced the price objective to $132.00 from $144.00. The analyst’s rating is influenced by a combination of factors. One of the key reasons […]
